google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review! About having different gifs between lock screen and main screen: actually, that is a tricky one. For starters, not all phones support having live wallpapers on the lock screen. On top of that, looking through the developer apis, I haven't found a way to detect if the wallpaper is on lock screen or not.
